doc:
Dots Johnson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dots_Johnson 0 Hylan Johnson (February 3, 1913 – August 22, 1986), professionally known as Dots Johnson, .'s Johnson, and Dotts Johnson, was an African American stage and film actor. He was best known for his roles as the American MP in Roberto Rossellini's 1946 film Paisan and as the boxing manager in the 1953 film The Joe Louis Story. Hylan_Johnson ( February_3_,_1913 – August_22_,_1986 ) , professionally_known as Dots_Johnson , . 's_Johnson , and Dotts_Johnson , was an_African_American_stage_and_film_actor . He was_best_known for his_roles as the_American_MP in Roberto_Rossellini 's 1946_film Paisan and as the_boxing_manager in the_1953_film The_Joe_Louis_Story .
